title: Heidi Cruz is asking super PAC donors to donate to her husband’s campaign. Here’s why ...
text: The $26.5 million Sen. Ted Cruz's campaign has raised since its inception is due in part to Cruz's most prolific fundraiser: his wife Heidi, who is on leave from her job as a managing director at Goldman Sachs. Heidi Cruz told The Washington Post last month that she made 600 donor calls in the second […] ...
